superheroes.name: Superman
superheroes.description: The last son of Krypton, Superman is the most powerful hero on Earth.

superheroes.name: Batman
superheroes.description: A vigilante who uses his intelligence, physical training, and technology to fight crime.

superheroes.name: Spider-Man
superheroes.description: A high school student bitten by a radioactive spider who gains spider-like abilities.

superheroes.name: Iron Man
superheroes.description: A multi-billionaire genius who built an advanced suit of armor to become a superhero.

superheroes.name: The Flash
superheroes.description: A forensic scientist who gained the ability to move at incredible speeds.

superheroes.name: Captain America
superheroes.description: A soldier who was enhanced to the peak of human physicality by an experimental serum.

superheroes.name: Aquaman
superheroes.description: The king of Atlantis who has the ability to communicate with marine life.

superheroes.name: Black Widow
superheroes.description: A highly skilled spy and former agent of S.H.I.E.L.D.

superheroes.name: Hulk
superheroes.description: A scientist who transforms into a giant, green monster when angry.

superheroes.name: Green Lantern
superheroes.description: A pilot who is chosen to be a part of the Green Lantern Corps.

superheroes.name: Thor
superheroes.description: The god of thunder from Asgard and a member of the Avengers.

superheroes.name: Black Panther
superheroes.description: King of Wakanda, a technologically advanced African kingdom.

superheroes.name: Cyborg
superheroes.description: An athlete who, after a terrible accident, was transformed into a cyborg by his father.

superheroes.name: Captain Marvel
superheroes.description: A pilot who acquired superhuman abilities after an accident with alien technology.

superheroes.name: Green Arrow
superheroes.description: A billionaire who became an expert archer after being stranded on a deserted island.

superheroes.name: Doctor Strange
superheroes.description: A neurosurgeon who became the Sorcerer Supreme and protector of Earth against magical threats.
